entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Grand Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
